image_prompt: Generate a Blizzard Concept Artists Styled fantasy scene featuring Elenor and her allies, united in a powerful group spell. They are surrounded by a powerful wave of energy, emanating outwards in a bright sphere of magical light. The Witch stands in the center, spellcaster arms outstretched, unaware of the powerful magic the group has summoned.
scene: Elenor and her allies stand united in a powerful group spell, with a wave of magical energy surrounding them. The Witch stands in the center, spellcaster arms outstretched, unaware of the powerful magic the group has summoned.
choices: The group decides to focus their magic and launch an offensive spell
The group decides to surprise the Witch by creating a shield and focusing their magic within it
